title: Gigabyte 128GB M.2 2280 PCIe 3.0x2 NVMe SSD
cat_seo_title: Gigabyte ssd price in Bangladesh | Star Tech
cat_seo_description: Gigabyte solid state drive price in Bangladesh . Order online or visit your nearest Star Tech branch
full_description:
The Gigabyte M.2 PCIe SSD 128GB

The Gigabyte M.2 PCIe SSD 128GB uses the Host Memory Buffer(HMB) feature to use the Direct Memory Access(DMA) of PCI Express which allows the SSD to use some of the DRAM on your PC. This allows the SSD to not use its own DRAM. This increases the performance of your daily work by boosting the performance of your controller and NAND Flash. The Sequential reading speed of this SSD is 1100MB/s and the writing speed is 500MB/s. You also get the facility of transferring your data faster compared to HDD. When we compare SSD to HDD we find that the SSD performs faster, Consumes less power, has better Vibration Resistance, there is no sound when the SSD is working and the best feature of SSD is that the Heat management is very good. Gigabyte has launched an application, which is the SSD Tool Box, that helps users to monitor how their SSD is performing. The information that you might get are, the health condition of the SSD, the drive optimization and also the temperature reading of the SSD. We are providing you with 3 years of warranty on the SSD.

values.value: Sequential Read speed Up to 1550 MB/s

The GIGABYTE 512GB M.2 PCIe SSD 

The Gigabyte 512GB M.2 PCIe SSD uses the Host Memory Buffer (HMB) feature to use the Direct Memory Access (DMA) of PCI Express which allows the SSD to use some of the DRAM on your PC. This allows the SSD to not use its own DRAM. This increases the performance of your daily work by boosting the performance of your controller and NAND Flash. The Sequential reading speed of this SSD is Up to Up to 1550 MB/s and the writing speed is Up to 850 MB/s. You also get the facility of transferring your data faster compared to HDD. When we compare SSD to HDD we find that the SSD performs faster, consumes less power, has better Vibration Resistance, there is no sound when the SSD is working and the best feature of SSD is that the Heat management is very good. Gigabyte has launched an application, which is the SSD Tool Box, that helps users to monitor how their SSD is performing. The information that you might get are, the health condition of the SSD, the drive optimization and the temperature reading of the SSD. We are providing you with 3 years of warranty on the SSD.

title: Gigabyte 1TB M.2 PCIe NVMe SSD
cat_seo_title: Gigabyte ssd price in Bangladesh | Star Tech
cat_seo_description: Gigabyte solid state drive price in Bangladesh . Order online or visit your nearest Star Tech branch
full_description:
Gigabyte 1TB M.2 PCIe NVMe SSD

Gigabyte 1TB M.2 PCIe NVMe SSD featured with Form Factor: M.2 2280, PCI-Express 3.0 x4, NVMe 1.3, Sequential Read Speed up to 2500 MB/s, Sequential Write speed up to 2100 MB/s. In this SSD, The Host Memory Buffer (HMB) feature utilizes the DMA (Direct Memory Access) of PCI Express to allow SSDs to use some of the DRAM on PC system, instead of requiring the SSD to bring its own DRAM. GIGABYTE M.2 PCIe SSD provides you faster data transferring experience compared to 2.5" SATA solid state drive. This Latest Gigabyte 1TB M.2 PCIe NVMe SSD comes with 03 years of warranty.
